content.p: We have a successful track record in hosting elite performance camps and are proud to be able provide an optimum training environment to help athletes and teams prepare for major competitions and events. Our world-class sports facilities are surrounded by a full range of accommodation options to suit your needs, all within walking distance. With an environment similar to competition ‘athlete village’ environments, we can provide the perfect space to optimise acclimatisation, preparation and transition ahead of competition. Bespoke catering solutions for specific and dietary needs Transport logistics and parking support 24-hour campus security Free Wi-Fi across campus On-site health centre and closely located to Queens Medical Centre for access to specialist or emergency support ICC Cricket World Cup Birmingham 2022 Commonwealth Games England Lionesses World Cup international warm-up fixtures The Hundred England Roses Reunited Series We have a dedicated events team that will work closely with you to understand your requirements and tailor your campus experience to meet your needs and provide a bespoke training and residential programme. If you are interested in hosting an elite training or performance camp, please enquire below. UoN Sport has hosted numerous training camps for England Netball ahead of Roses Reunited Series and Birmingham 2022 Commonwealth Games. Our state-of-the-art facilities can be transformed to host sporting competitions and external events and can help you stage an event like no other. Find out more about our exciting partnership and sponsorship opportunities at University of Nottingham Sport.
